name: KKorDie
description:
The enemies hate us and now, they are coming to Earth and want to destroy us. Only you can stop them.  You can be able to use guns and shotguns. Help yourself with your abilities like shields, thunders and cures. If all goes wrong, request air support, but remember: "You are our only hope".

Each enemy will give you points that will allow you to unlock new missions and face the final boss

UPDATES

If support and downloads to the game are good, we will perform updates and add weapons, enemies, bosses and more maps. Meanwhile we are working in new games.  We will keep you informed about this

INSTALLATION

You will need a compression program  to extract the game exe. 
After extracting, just start the .exe file and enjoy!

Thank you for any comments, either by supporting or commenting things to improve.

For any questions contact with me in anlogoapps@gmail.com
